summary: trigger from external function when embedded into a website

ports.name: Function Name
ports.text: The name of the function you want to define, e.g. when you name the function `myFunction` you can trigger it from your JavaScript-Code using `CABLES.patch.config.myFunction();`

ports.name: trigger
ports.text: Execute the trigger from inside cables, for testing or to combine internal / external trigger

todos.message: needs new version with new string type input
